story.title: #UpLateInPompeii at the British Museum
story.description: On Friday 10 May, visitors to the Museum stayed #UpLateInPompeii and enjoyed a night on the town Pompeii and Herculaneum style! Thanks for joining in and tweeting your photos, here are some highlights...

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Look out for live tweeting at #UpLateInPompeii on Friday and tweet your photos using the hashtag – see you there!

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #IceAgeArt http://t.co/KCjGwnVSth and #PompeiiExhibition now open! http://t.co/jUbevi6UXt
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: Look out for live tweeting at #UpLateInPompeii on Friday and tweet your photos using the hashtag – see you there!
